title: Desert regions: nomads and traders
creator_credit: Wolfgang Bayer and BFA Educational Media
brief_description: A comparison between two traditional cultures occupying desert lands and the ways in which both tribes customs are being forced into change. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
